title: How Long Opened Wine Bottles Last

items.name: Red wine
items.details: Lasts up to 5 days if stored properly. Reseal and refrigerate.

items.name: White and rose wine
items.details: Lasts about 3-4 days. Reseal and store in the fridge.

items.name: Sparkling wine
items.details: Shortest shelf life at only 1-3 days before losing carbonation.

notes: Always reseal the bottle and store it in the fridge to maximize its lifespan after opening.
